Brazil's Lula spotlights Global South in G20 presidencyBrazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has set his sights on giving the Global South a larger voice in world decision-making, using his country's presidency this year of the G20 group of largest economies. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 10:03:49 GMT HK7WPU2NZVNADA6YIRNMRRAWTPY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-lula-spotlights-global-south-g20-presidency-2024-02-27/Lisandra Paraguassu, Leika Kihara, Marcela Ayres世界美洲
Russia jails rights campaigner Orlov for 2-1/2 yearsVeteran human rights activist Oleg Orlov was sentenced on Tuesday by a Moscow court to two and a half years in prison after he was found guilty of discrediting Russian's armed forces in a trial that has been condemned by international observers as politically motivated. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 09:37:05 GMT ZDQZ5TZGNKIZC25LJMWKBGLB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-jails-rights-campaigner-orlov-2-12-years-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Navalny ally says election day protest will be opposition leader's 'last testament'Leonid Volkov, a close ally of the late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, said that a protest called for March 17, the final day of Russia's presidential election, would be Navalny's "last testament". Tue, 27 Feb 2024 09:23:06 GMT DLTHO72QWFKNHG2AX7NQHY3I3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalny-ally-says-election-day-protest-will-be-opposition-leaders-last-testament-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Thai opposition leader will 'fight tooth and nail' for party's survivalThailand's opposition leader and former prime ministerial hopeful said on Tuesday his Move Forward Party will "fight tooth and nail" for its future amid legal threats that could see the pro-reform group dissolved and its leaders banned from politics. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 09:09:25 GMT HKFVI4BNTNKWFMFZZG4IMXJZCA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-opposition-leader-will-fight-tooth-nail-partys-survival-2024-02-27/Panu Wongcha-Um世界亚太地区
North Korea has sent 6,700 containers of munitions to Russia, South Korea saysNorth Korea has shipped about 6,700 containers carrying millions of munitions to Russia since July to support its war against Ukraine, in a sign of ongoing arms transfers, South Korean media reported on Tuesday, citing the defence minister. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 08:37:12 GMT JLAJMD7DCFOV7FGE6NYWUIJS6M https://www.reuters.com/world/north-korea-has-sent-6700-containers-munitions-Russia-south-korea-says-2024-02-27/Hyonhee Shin世界
Jailed Pakistan's ex-PM Imran Khan, wife indicted on graft chargesA Pakistani court indicted jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan and his third wife Bushra Bibi on Tuesday on charges that they allegedly received land as a bribe by misusing his office during his premiership, his party said. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 08:28:22 GMT 24PGU53GVNJ3BDEDTNGTOHBFMM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-ex-pm-imran-khan-wife-indicted-graft-case-geo-news-2024-02-27/Asif Shahzad世界亚太地区
Details of 40-day Gaza truce draft proposal being studied by HamasHamas has received a draft proposal from Gaza truce talks in Paris for a pause in military operations and the exchange of Palestinian prisoners for Israeli hostages, a senior source close to the talks said on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 07:30:28 GMT 6DDYRCORUBJBAET5OYYQ46LA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/details-40-day-gaza-truce-draft-proposal-being-studied-by-hamas-2024-02-27/Reuters世界中东
Italy's Meloni suffers setback as centre-left claims Sardinia election winItalian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni is set for her first regional election loss since winning power in 2022 after a centre-left candidate appeared to have won the vote for the president of Sardinia, partial results showed on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 07:18:11 GMT DLQGZJQMARJ5NDUTWR2YQMRLKY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italys-meloni-suffers-setback-centre-left-claims-sardinia-election-win-2024-02-27/Angelo Amante世界欧洲
Hezbollah says fired 'large volley of rockets' at Israeli surveillance baseHezbollah said on Tuesday it had launched a volley of rockets at an Israeli aerial surveillance base in response to the Israeli military's deepest attack yet into Lebanese territory. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 07:12:36 GMT DPVCLX6CGFOT7OWJOKYTOZPQJU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-says-fired-large-volley-rockets-israeli-surveillance-base-2024-02-27/Reuters世界中东
Japan's new births fall to record low in 2023 as demographic woes deepenThe number of babies born in Japan fell for an eighth straight year to a fresh record low in 2023, preliminary government data showed on Tuesday, underscoring the daunting task the country faces in trying to stem depopulation. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 06:46:14 GMT Z5UZT35UYNKNXFOLEEQY6V5SKA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/number-births-japan-hits-record-low-2023-2024-02-27/Kiyoshi Takenaka, Satoshi Sugiyama世界亚太地区
Biden: Israel agrees to halt military activity over Ramadan, risks losing world supportU.S. President Joe Biden said Israel has agreed not to engage in military activities during Ramadan in the Gaza Strip, where it is at war with Hamas militants, and said the Jewish state risked losing support from the rest of the world as Palestinians die in high numbers. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 06:29:18 GMT HMUAXPMW5KQBOAHTFQ2Y6JEWU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-israel-agrees-halt-military-activity-over-ramadan-risks-losing-world-2024-02-27/Jeff Mason世界中东
